name: Mangalam
description:
Mangalam is a game about Nikita, an archaeologist who accidentally activated a portal into the world of Jatayumangalam,  consisting of flying islands, giant crystals, soaring towers and legendary beasts. Soon after, the portal closes, leaving her stranded.

Follow the journey of Nikita as she travels around the islands to activate the towers that connects to the portal so that she can go back home once again.

Build, Craft, Mine and collect resources as you go along each island, while paying attention to your hunger. Dont forget to be wary of the creatures that spawn at night!

Use giant ballistas to fight giant birds, and activate the towers to reopen the portal and make your way back home!
